document_data.name: Tu'ara'thal
document_data.mainbody: '''Tu'ara'thal''' was a [[shalarin]] cleric of [[Oghma]] in [[Myth Nantar]].
document_data.History:
Born into the shalarin's Seeker Caste, Tu'ara'thal followed the call of Oghma and joined the Faiths Caste.

Around [[1349 DR]], Tu'ara'thal, with the unborn [[Ka'ioa'Tara]] still inside her, led her husband [[Po'ioa'nam]] to penetrate the [[Great Barrier]] after fleeing a group of [[Merrow (ogre)|merrow]] that had killed all his companions. [[Qos]] accepted Po'ioa'nam and his wife and permitted them to settle in the city.
